abstract: Executives said that India’s insistence on gathering trade secrets would at the least be bad business, and could also violate American technology transfer laws.
snippet: Executives said that India’s insistence on gathering trade secrets would at the least be bad business, and could also violate American technology transfer laws.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI  In the last year, the Indian government surprised foreign telecommunications equipment suppliers like Huawei, Alcatel-Lucent and Cisco Systems by temporarily blocking the import of new network gear.

headline.main: Tech Firms Resist India on Software Code Secrets
headline.print_headline: Tech Firms Resist India On Software Code Secrets

byline.original: By Vikas Bajaj and Ian Austen
